title: Configuration and use of the dashboard
content: The Emprez dashboard allows you to understand what's going on in your account at a glance.Timesheets to approvedOn the Dashboard, they are classified:By pay period Per employee, with the number of timesheets to be approved in parenthesesStart approving timesheets from the Dashboard:Select the employees or employees to display,Click on Approve,Or click on Today or Yesterday to hide the other dates in the period.Plans checkingEmprez checks if all your plans are filled.You will be alerted if you have too many employees on schedule, or if you do not have enough employees on the floor.Employee schedule verificationYou will get an alert for the following situations: The employee will receive an overtime premiumHiring information is missingThere is a conflict between the employee's availability and the planned scheduleClick on the error to display the week in error.Consult this article to correct then depending on the situation.Shifts to fill validationYou must first activate the display of this option to use it.You will get an alert for the following situations: You sent to create a Shift to fill and you have not yet received an answerYou asked the other employees to occupy or take certain missing shiftsUser PreferencesYou can modify the content of your Dashboard and your default information from this window:Once you are connected, click on your name at the top right in the blue bar to modify your preferences.The verification period is modifiable, to make this change, click on your name in the upper right corner.Here are related articles to help you use the other tools: Predetermined ShiftsShifts to FillAdd photo to employeesDisplay of plans in the schedules by positionsHelpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
